extraction_metadata.notes: Case demonstrates professional/investment firm credential variant of Pig Butchering, differing from typical romance-based approach. Multi-step onboarding process (wallet download, account creation, fund transfer) adds sophistication and legitimacy appearance. Platform pzmqgow.top included customer service function before exit.
